settings.subtitle: Meal Prep made simple
settings.title: Partner With NZ's Best Ready Made Meal Company
settings.text: Join the fastest growing health and fitness community in New Zealand and make a positive impact in the lives of your customers with our retail partnership programme. We provide your business a hands free added revenue stream and take care of the nutritional needs of your customers to help deliver the results that you both deserve.

settings.title: What We Bring To The Table
settings.text1: We design recipes which people love and make them super healthy and nutritious. Our meals are made with wholefoods and have no nasty ingredients. Being snap frozen, they have a 12 month shelf life from the day we make them.
settings.text2: We communicate directly to the customers via our online channels and provide value added information about health and well being along with the benefits of eating healthy.
settings.text3: Our marketing includes regular social media mentions and boosted social media campaigns targeting customers in your area.
settings.text4: Using our online ordering platform, you can place orders in a few seconds and we deliver directly to your door.

settings.subtitle: Get In Touch
settings.title: Interested In Learning More?
settings.text: Let us know who your are and the nature of your business are and we'll be in touch to discuss how SwoleFoods can support you in achieving your business goals
